title: 25 Books on Quantum Field Theory
description:
The following books are in here:

- Quantum Field Theoretical Methods in Statistical Physics 2nd Edition
- Quantum Chromodynamics 2nd Edition
- Nonperturbative Quantum Field Theory and the Structure of Matter
- Gauge Theories in Particle Physics 3rd Edition Volume 1
- The Quantum Theory of Fields Volume 1 Foundations
- The Quantum Theory of Fields Volume 2 Modern Applications
- The Quantum Theory of Fields Super Symmetry
- The Quantum Field Theory of Electric and Magnetic Charge
- The Dirac Equation
- Quantum Field Theory Proceedings of the Ringberg Workshop
- Quantum Field Theory in Curved Spacetime
- Quantum Field Theory In A Nutshell
- Quantum Field Theory (R Clarkson D McKeon)
- Quantum Field Theory (L Brown)
- Quantum Field Theory (J Norbury)
- QFT and Topology
- New Developments in Quantum Field Theory
- Introduction to Relativistic Quantum Field Theory
- Introduction to Quantum Field Theory In Condensed Matter Physics
- Introduction to Algebraic and Constructive Quantum Field Theory
- Fields (W Siegel)
- Field Quantization (W Greiner J Reinhardt)
- Conformal Field Theory (P DiFrancesco P Mathieu D Senechal)
- Concepts in Theoretical Physics (B Simons)
- An Introduction to Quantum Field Theory (Peskin and Schroeder)

Included is a program which allows you to the DJVU files (basically an awkward version of PDF files).

~~~
